mapper.insert:
insert into com_fiction( id, fic_name,
fic_author,
gmt_create, gmt_modified ) values ( #{id}, #{ficName},
#{ficAuthor},
now(), now() );
insert into com_fiction_data (id, fic_id, fic_data, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted) VALUE (#{id}, #{ficId}, #{text}, now(), now(), 0);
insert into com_fiction_type (id, fic_id, fic_type, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted) value (#{id}, #{ficId}, #{typeId}, now(), now(), 0);
mapper.select: SELECT f.id AS id, f.fic_name AS ficName, f.fic_author AS ficAuthor, ct.ty_name AS ficType, f.gmt_create AS createTime, f.gmt_modified AS updateTime, f.is_deleted AS isDeleted, f.fic_img AS ficImg, f.fic_host AS ficHost FROM com_fiction f INNER JOIN com_fiction_type t ON f.id = t.fic_id INNER JOIN com_type ct ON t.fic_type = ct.id;

SELECT f.id AS id, f.fic_name AS ficName, f.fic_author AS ficAuthor, ct.ty_name AS ficType, f.gmt_create AS createTime, f.gmt_modified AS updateTime, f.is_deleted AS isDeleted, f.fic_img AS ficImg, f.fic_host AS ficHost FROM com_fiction f INNER JOIN com_fiction_type t ON f.id = t.fic_id INNER JOIN com_type ct ON t.fic_type = ct.id order by createTime DESC;

SELECT f.id AS id, f.fic_name AS ficName, f.fic_author AS ficAuthor, ct.ty_name AS ficType, f.gmt_create AS createTime, f.gmt_modified AS updateTime, f.is_deleted AS isDeleted, f.fic_img AS ficImg, f.fic_host AS ficHost FROM com_fiction f INNER JOIN com_fiction_type t ON f.id = t.fic_id INNER JOIN com_type ct ON t.fic_type = ct.id order by ficHost DESC;
select f.id AS id from com_fiction f inner join com_fiction_type t on f.id = t.fic_id where t.fic_type = #{tid};
select id AS id , fic_data AS ficData , gmt_create AS createTime , gmt_modified AS updateTime from com_fiction_data where fic_id = #{id};
